sentences.sentence: With characteristic astuteness, he spoke separately to all those involved.
sentences.translation: 凭着他特有的精明，他同有关人士一一进行了谈话。

sentences.sentence: Young Singaporeans seem to lack the astuteness and dynamism that they possess.
sentences.translation: 新加坡年轻人似乎就缺少了那份机灵和朝气。

sentences.sentence: Every time we got together, she would declare her astuteness and would never take my advice because it was always wrong.
sentences.translation: 每一次我们在一起时，她总会想办法证明她的聪明而绝不会接受我的建议，因为总认为我是错的。
